Banking & Finance.title: RBI paper on monetary policy says raising inflation target above 4% could erode policy gains
Banking & Finance.summary: The RBI formally adopted the flexible inflation targeting framework in late 2016 with a 4 per cent target in a band of 2-6 per cent. The target is valid for five years, after which it must be reviewed.
